segments.text: And it's also lunch time. I was eating my lunch.
I don't know what it is with my room, but the temperatures are all over the place.
Like, even when I had my computer on for a while yesterday, my room was completely freezing.
I don't know why, so my nose is a bit runny.
And now that I have the heater on, I have a heat pack on me, and everything else, it's kind of...
It's kind of okay, I guess.
I might be catching a cold, I don't know.
But yeah, it's so weird because if the temperature changes a lot like this, I usually do catch a cold because my body's just like,
Oh, it's hot? Okay, I'll be ready. No, it's cold. Okay, I'll be ready. Oh, it's hot? I'll be ready.
And it gets really tired. And then the cold is just like, hey, may I come in? Yeah. So, yeah.
Am I sick? No, my nose is just running.
I'm not coughing or anything, it's just my nose is running a lot.
I had really spicy chicken... What is this? Like chicken stew thing?
It had a lot of peppers in it.
You know when your food is really really spicy and you inhale it and you're just like...
And then it just goes in your breathing tube and it's just like, oop, okay.
Oh, Akemashite omedetou! Happy New Year, Ina!
Actually, I finally became a silver taco at January 1st!
I can still remember the moment I joined the membership.
If you allow my queen, I'd still be one of the taco community members.
And you don't even have to pay!
Same with everyone. Everyone's always welcome.
As long as I'm streaming, you guys can be always free to join us whenever you want.
No voice chat today? Oh, I will be joining voice chat in a little bit.
Just be sitting there. If people want to join, they can hop in, but if not, they don't have to.
I literally just told everyone, like, right before the stream started.
Usually a lot of people are asleep at this hour.
Will I be playing with people? Not too much today.
Because I played with you guys
for the last couple of practice streams.
I want to practice some shortcuts.
And I actually find some shortcuts that I can practice.
There are a few tracks that I really need to improve on, like Ribbon Road.
So I'll be working on those.
And yeah, just some refining time.
I have another collab tomorrow with some members across the branches.
So I guess I'll kind of see where I stand roughly with everyone I haven't played with before actually, a lot of them.
So yeah, Yuruho no Minecraft... Minecraft? Minecraft?
Can I play against other holo members' ghosts? If I have them on my friends list, I do see some of them.
For example, I wonder if there's anyone who has...
It's on the one track that I'm really bad at. There we go.
I should be good with Ribbon Road because it was on the Game Boy.
I mean, I can't even win against things like...
Okay, I didn't win against Aqua Senpai.
The time difference between me and Aqua Senpai is a little...
I don't think I'm getting that.
So, let's maybe start with another map.
Maybe there's some that I have not beaten yet.
I guess not many people uploaded it to this one.
Have I beaten Cheep Cheep Beach? I did.
Oh yeah, and I beat Sana's record too, I think.
Oh yeah, Ako-senpai is a little busy, you know, preparing for a concert. But you never know, you never know.
I need some practice with this, too, actually. Look at my score. Look at my score.
I think it's a little rough.
Yeah, okay. I think this one I can work on. Definitely.
I have Oli, Fuki, and Sana to beat.
Hey, you never know with Aqua-senpai, she might practice a little bit off-stream and she'll be de-rusted like no problem.
Okay, maybe I'll start with this.
I kind of want to view the ghost first actually, the Nintendo ghost.
I know my ghost, I didn't do very well.
Okay, I'm just watching right now. This is the ghost.
My hands are off. I'm not driving.
The Nintendo ghost isn't even drifting!
I'm being beaten by health controls?
Not drifting, just following the road.
The ghosts are terrible. Apparently I'm worse because I haven't beaten them yet.
Okay, there's always that branch that you gotta jump using the mushroom
On the second lap, they use it on this one.
I'm really bad at picking up coins, yeah.
So I guess technically, this part is actually pretty...
Hey, it's not using the thing on this one!
Is it even for the last?
Because of the twisty turns, I think it's really nice to be able to jump that.
Coins are important, so I gotta figure out how to get as many coins as possible.
Though I feel like in the actual race, I lose so many coins even if I get...
It's just showing me all the different ways to use the mushroom.
I feel like the middle part is definitely...
Hi, my name is Ninomai Inanis. I miss all the coins.
Oh, I'm so bad at this part.
Okay, I got to make sure I land properly there.
See if I can get that boost.
Okay, I don't have to touch that as much.
Ah, the right side! Okay, there's a little bit of boost at the end.
Man, I still only have 6 coins. Why am I so bad?
Wait, I'm already done. I'm already slower than my last record.
Yeah, there's a little bit of bump here. I can get a small bit of boost.
Oh, it is a new record. How slow was I?
I lost... Okay, second lap I was faster.
I lost a lot of time in the first lap.
I can improve my third lap, definitely.
The second lap I was a little faster.
Practice going left at the sandpit.
You know, knowing what to do is one thing, actually being able to execute it is another, okay?
So no matter how much you yell at me...
Oh, I missed all the coins! Yay!
I don't know what I want to do.
Oh, so where you come out of here and you just zoom over?
I'm just driving on the sand now.
This is one of my weak maps.
How have they turned so well?
Can I just like slow down, not accelerate?
I needed to make time. Okay.
Okay, so the thing about braking while drifting, right?
Is it a little tapped? Because if I press brake too long, then it stops the...
Okay I almost caught up, I almost caught up.
Wait, I'll look at chat after.
Okay, I can beat the ghost.
I beat the ghost, but, um...
I made it for a lot of time at the very end, huh?
I was late on both the...
Oh, the second one I was a little faster, but...
Like, if you hold it too long, you lose your drift, right?
No brake on drift, it's bad in 150. Okay.
Okay, so it is just a tap.
I have been practicing a little bit on some tight corners.
I wanna practice against some of the ghosts.
If you hit hard right, hard left, you get more Drift Boosting.
I do know about it already.
I told you, it's one thing knowing about it, and another thing...
Actually being able to carry it out.
Dun dun. Dun dun dun dun.
I do want to see a different ghost for this one though.
Let's see, is there like a not too fast...
I feel like all of these will take the same route.
Should I look for a sub 2 minutes?
Always go with the first, okay.
I want to see it. I just want to see what the time difference is.
Oh, they're using a different cart!
Maybe this is the cart to go for this map.
I don't think I can do this.
Wait, I hope I'm not racing against this ghost.
It's fine. It's fine. It's clearly fine.
wait they went like here and they went like a boost here
I have a feeling they're gonna like, lap around me.
They went like this, and then like here, and they boosted and they boosted off here, and I'm just like...
Oh my... Wait, I'm not in the voice chat yet, I forgot.
Hold on, I need to replay this.
You know, let me race you, I'll just go home. Oh, come on!
I'm on my phone, let's go!
I'm on my phone because I moved my Switch over to my bedroom to a big TV and I've been playing there today.
And you like coffee. I think I'm gonna play the tournament from bed as well at 5 a.m.
If you start running into the wall, I'll know.
I stay in bed and I race a little bit and I just turn the TV off and I go back to sleeping.
If you start running into the wall, you're gonna end up in the Zaku Cup.
Okay, I made a room if you wanna join me.
Is it just gonna be us or is it gonna be other people too?
It's gonna be me, you, and the CPUs.
Okay, let me get coffee under my blanket.
Oh, I hope you don't hear it.
Wait, I'll turn it down a little bit.
Oh, you're gonna be playing the music, huh?
I have it all on blast.
Uh, wait, I need to get out of my own cups.
Oh, golden, golden, oh, golden award from the last one I played.
Okay, okay, okay. Wait, you sent it to me on where?
Uh, oh yeah, just join the friends, yeah.
That was you in, like, 5,000 years of practice.
I'll see what you're made of.
This is even my final form, Aimee.
I still don't have the cards that I want to go with.
I just laughed into my coffee and the sheer force of the laugh splashed coffee on me.
That's what you get for making fun of me, Ina!
Oh no, copy of my keyboard! What am I gonna do?
Let's go! Okay, 150, no teams, hard to come, all vehicles...
I don't think you can take more than that, Ina.
Are you sure about that? Okay, okay.
I mean, in that death map where you just were in, I think I'm better than you.
I think so. Oh, oh shit. But I didn't warm up yet.
Oh, random. I see, I see. Are you chicken? Are you chicken?
Are you chicken or are you... We're warming up in a nice desert, okay?
Just watch and see and learn.
Alright, alright. Teach me your ways. Oh, I see you changed your cart. Mm-hmm.
No, I- I- this is still the same, I don't have...
When you beat me just now as a ghost, you didn't have that, uh...
There's a rule of thumb in Mario Kart, it's never good to go first.
Yeah, look at my cute butt, Ine!
Yeah, I see a cute butt.
Oh, I felt it. I definitely felt it.
Oh no! Just because I was so good.
I don't need a heart anymore.

Heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, heh
This isn't even my final form!
Are you number one right now?
I'm never number one in your heart, am I?
I did not throw that! I did not throw it!
That was me. That was me. I hope you like that one.

Bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum
I don't know about that, I don't know about that.
Oh, I'm just doing random now.
If there's one that you want to practice, make sure you can select it here.
I think I'll have to set one to go.
We got the same item, Inu.
Because I was blowing your head?
I was ahead of you for one second.
When I was practicing today and yesterday,
I've been paying more attention to collecting money now.
Oh, apparently it's really important, so...
Wait, how did Link get in front of me?
Hehe, I'm not going down alone.
Oh no, I'm a six! Oh no!
Okay, there's a... there's a shortcut here.
No no no no! Stop! Stop right there! Nooooo!
Okay, that one was not so good.
Pei, you're still third! You're still third!
I bet Zelda called or something.
Speeding to get to the finish line.
Well, well, well, he's a quick guy.
He's not the hero for no reason.
There's a reason why there's so many games about him.
Oh, okay. I'm so traumatized by this track.
Oh, Ghost, what the hell is the matter with you?
No, not the red shell while I'm in air! No, no, no, no, no, I escaped from it, yatta!

Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes
It's okay, I'm still ahead, I'm still ahead. I can, I can do this.
I love how the music like goes like really weird too, to be honest.
I stopped and I didn't get it, too?
Oh, that's too unfortunate, isn't it?
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey!
That was big brain, though. That was big brain.
Ah, I should've gone that mushroom.
And I haven't even practiced that much yet. I want to do the ghost time races, and I also want to look up at least some shortcuts.
I don't know if I can remember them.
I think the only ones I remember are the ones I grinded on stream, otherwise I don't remember.
One of the few ones that I know is the one from Yoshi's Island, but...
Yoshi's Island really confuses me, because there's so many routes you can take.
So many? I only know one, like one shortcut.
Oh no, like, there's like different branches that you can take, right?
Oh, come on. Eat that, Inyo.
I'm really bad at this part of Big Flu. I need to practice this.
That didn't faze me at all.
What is going on, you know?
Oh, come on. Was that you?
Was that my bomb? Was that my bomb?
Oh, there was a blue shot, but I blocked it.
I had the right item in just like literally a moment before.
You're getting a little bit ahead now, I guess.
Oh, I lost my moment. Oh god.
I was number one for the longest time!
Okay, at least I'm getting seconds.
I win this round, girl! I win this round!
Oh, I don't know about that. I'm still, I'm still...
I was first for 90% of it!
Oh, what is this? A golden trophy?
Mine is beautiful rose gold, okay?
It's true, true, rose gold, rose gold.
I'm telling you, I know the difference.
I know the difference between rose gold and bronze.
Is someone else coming in here?
I was just gonna train against ghosts for the entire stream if no one came around.
I'm the ghost, I'm the ghost.
I'm the ghost of your past.
What will it be? What will it be?
Are you also not planning to stream the tournament?
I feel like no one from Myth is streaming it.
Ami said she doesn't want to stream it, and I think Callie also said she's not going to stream it.
Because at least then, you can focus more.
They don't want to stay in it. I understand.
Oh my god, it's like a rollercoaster!
I have so many bad memories on this track!
Was it when you were playing in your viewers?
No, and against you! I keep on getting my ass kickity-kicked!
Not today, she said. Not today.
Oh, you can, you can, uh...
Bonk against these cards and bonk on you.
Yeah! Cause you're in the anti-gravity mode.
At least now there's a big difference from last time when we raced
At least now I can keep up with you
But now I'm getting kicked my ass by the NPCs
That wasn't even you, Kiara! That was the Animal Crossing villager.
I can't get to the front anymore!
You can do it! Don't give up!
Oh! The banana on the road took my shell!
What's going on? It's not fair back here! The front is more peaceful!
That was just unlucky. Yeah, that was just...
Oh, you're also pretty far behind. What happened?
That was unlucky. I got unlucky at the end.
I tried to... I tried to...
I was like 6th and 7th and I still only got shitty items.
I guess it's like, sometimes when the first place is really really ahead,
then they get really good items, even if you're pretty high up.
But when everyone's close, apparently... Oh really? Is that so?
I don't know! Apparently some people said that, but...
Is that not just a myth? A holo myth?
It's okay, I just gotta beat that animal crossing villager
Just gotta get that backdrift. Yeah, yeah to it. Oh, I didn't get the items
Fine I got a shell. That's good. I got them for you. Do you want them? Go through what what?
Hi, I should really get... Oh, oh, okay.
That's what you meant. I thought you meant you got like a blue shell or something.
It's a present for you! Get used to it!
No, that's gross. It has never happened before, you're on the ghost's door.
Oh ho ho, they got four red shells!
I hope you're not right behind me.
Someone else got me with their red shell!
It's okay, I'm so far ahead—oh.
Did you get a blue shell?
Maybe it was just chance that I didn't block that one shell because the blue one was going off.
All according to keikaku. Are you okay, Kiara?
No! What's going on? Kiara, where are you?
What's going on? Kiara, where are you?
I was driving pretty well, but...
Did you take the shortcut, but it wasn't really the shortcut, it was actually a road to nowhere?
Oh, I was trying to take the shortcut once, and then just test it, and then realized, okay, I need a speed item for that.
And then later, you know the part where you...
Oh! Oh, okay. The part where you fly, I was taking off, but then...
Even though I didn't get hit by an item, it let me drop to the bottom anyway.
You have to steer, so make sure you don't fall all the way.
Was I steering too low? Maybe, yeah.
I guess so. It's kinda automatically when you fly.
I never realized you had to steer all, like, I mean, maybe for some of them to, if there's, like, a choice, like, in some maps, there's a choice between two different places to land on.
You can steer up and down a little bit, so you can go further in the air.
You know when you fly a paper airplane, and you aim it up, and it goes a little higher, and then it goes a little further down?
I'm never good at taking the shortcut.
Can you make a flip-flopper airplane in here?
I've made some good ones before.
But they haven't gone that far.
I've seen some that go super fast and super far.
But I've never tried to make them myself because I don't really go outside to test them out.
Don't worry, I received the gift very nicely.
It shattered on the way though.
I did not throw that shell! I think my left bumper is broken.
I should probably use the trigger button.
I don't release it. The button releases.

Oh, we might have a second guess.
She might not be joining the voice chat, but she might be joining the race.
I don't know if she's joining the next one or...

Gosh, Ina, let's do this, let's party
Should've kept that one for later.
Do you know which side is better here? Is there a better side?
I don't know, whichever you're comfortable with, I think.
I always choose a different one.
Damn it, Ina! Stop blocking my presence!
I'm opening it as I get him, you know?

I'm using tail controls. Oh, that's lame.

On 50-60 race, no teams, normal items, hard to climb, all vehicles, 4 races.
Ame is just, you know, it's okay.
In the Nintendo universe, Yoshi is like...
Yoshi is one of my top 3 favorite characters.

I have it. I have it. I have it.
It's fine. It's fine. It's fine.
I missed all the coins. Okay, that's good.

Okay, go for a double. Double box.
